subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Brawn GP’s Jenson Button can keep his Formula One victories, and Ferrari will have to rush to redesign its car. The world motor sports governing body approved the use of a rear diffuser design that helped Button win the season’s first two races, in Australia and Malaysia. The decision by F.I.A.’s International Court of Appeals ends efforts by Ferrari, Renault, BMW Sauber and Red Bull Racing to protest the diffusers. Had they won their appeal, Button could have had his victories annulled.
